content.raw:
We can also remove:

* `gzmanipulator` since the models being viewed can't be translated / rotated
* `gzlogplay`
* `gzradialmenu` to be consistent: menus for desktop are not included, so neither should be those for mobile
* `gzspawnmodel`, it looks like we don't need it for this use case?

If we can really get rid of all of those, we would actually end up with only `gz`, `gzscene` and `gzssdfparser`, so we might as well add them one by one.
content.html:
We can also remove:

  • gzmanipulator since the models being viewed can't be translated / rotated
  • gzlogplay
  • gzradialmenu to be consistent: menus for desktop are not included, so neither should be those for mobile
  • gzspawnmodel, it looks like we don't need it for this use case?

If we can really get rid of all of those, we would actually end up with only gz, gzscene and gzssdfparser, so we might as well add them one by one.
